div.p:
As we win battles, we capture more of the map. Win a province
with a Dojo and we will unlock a new unit type for our army.

There are different Dojos available, each offering a specific unit type,
indicated by their icon. Units unlocked get added to our
roster in the army management panel.

During a battle our units can gain experience. If a unit gains enough
in a single battle, they may reach veteran status. Accepting a

veteran into our army adds them to the veteran unit roster. These
units can then be called into future battles, earn more
experience and be upgraded with new skills.

Veteran units can be customised via the tab on the army management
panel. With our veteran selected, we'll click the customise button.
Now we can name them and play around with their colours.

Clicking the veteran upgrade button will open this panel. Here we
can spend veteran skill points on improving this unit's abilities.

We left-click an upgrade to apply it. This unit is now more powerful
but will cost us more should we decide to take it into our next battle.
